LanguageData.FeelingRandomBipolar.stages.0.label: Feeling manic
LanguageData.FeelingRandomBipolar.stages.0.descriptio: For no apparent reason, I just feel absolutely fantastic right now!
LanguageData.FeelingRandomBipolar.stages.1.label: Feeling great
LanguageData.FeelingRandomBipolar.stages.1.descriptio: For no apparent reason, I just feel great right now.
LanguageData.FeelingRandomBipolar.stages.2.label: Feeling good
LanguageData.FeelingRandomBipolar.stages.2.descriptio: For no apparent reason, I just feel good right now.
LanguageData.FeelingRandomBipolar.stages.3.label: Feeling bad
LanguageData.FeelingRandomBipolar.stages.3.descriptio: For no apparent reason, I just feel bad right now.
LanguageData.FeelingRandomBipolar.stages.4.label: Feeling terrible
LanguageData.FeelingRandomBipolar.stages.4.descriptio: For no apparent reason, I just feel terrible right now.
LanguageData.FeelingRandomBipolar.stages.5.label: Feeling depressive
LanguageData.FeelingRandomBipolar.stages.5.descriptio: For no apparent reason, I just feel utterly miserable right now...
LanguageData.Codependency.stages.0.label: feeling alone
LanguageData.Codependency.stages.0.description: I'm so lonely... I need a partner.
LanguageData.Codependency.stages.1.label: in a codependent relationship
LanguageData.Codependency.stages.1.description: I love my partner. I couldn't live without them.
LanguageData.Codependency.stages.2.label: in a codependent marriage
LanguageData.Codependency.stages.2.description: I love my spouse. I would die without them.
LanguageData.Codependency.stages.3.label: desolate
LanguageData.Codependency.stages.3.description: My partner is gone... what do I do now?
LanguageData.Outdoorsy.stages.0.label: in the open
LanguageData.Outdoorsy.stages.0.description: I like feeling the sky above me.
LanguageData.Outdoorsy.stages.1.label: in the open
LanguageData.Pluviophile.stages.0.label: raining outside
LanguageData.Pluviophile.stages.0.description: I like the sound of the rain beating down above me.
LanguageData.Pluviophile.stages.1.label: in the rain
LanguageData.Pluviophile.stages.1.description: The rain is so relaxing. I don't mind getting wet.
LanguageData.PolygamousRelationship.stages.0.label: in a monogamous relationship
LanguageData.PolygamousRelationship.stages.0.descript: I wish my love didn't have to be limited to one person.
LanguageData.EnvironmentDarkLightSensitive.stages.2.d: My eyes! It hurts so much!
